articles.description: Football Queensland is engulfed in an executive pay scandal that has outraged high-profile national players, seen young players slugged with higher fees, and led to an internationally known whistleblower being sued.
articles.content:
The first time Murray Bird saw the new boss's salary, he says he was "horrified".
Former politician Robert Cavallucci was hired on nearly double the pay of the last chief executive at Football Queen… [+16165 chars]
